headline: $38.28 Bn Endpoint Security Market Analysis by Solution, Service, Enforcement Point, Vertical, Region - Global Forecast to 2030
summary: The global endpoint security market is set to expand from USD 27.46 billion in 2025 to USD 38.28 billion by 2030, growing at a 6.3% CAGR. With increasing remote work and hybrid IT environments, organizations face high risks of internal misuse of entitlements. Implementing endpoint privilege management, which minimizes user permissions, helps mitigate these risks.
